name: The Search (itch) (Danii)
description:
You've spent a long time without getting bit. Day after day in the apocalypse you've spent living, thriving, and surviving. 

All good things have to come to an end. You've found yourself bit out of pure and utter carelessness. You don't know if your little sister will survive without you.

You have to make sure you live so she does. You have heard of a cure further north, it is your only hope.
